questions.question: What is the major difference between half-adders and full-adders

answers.a: Full-adders are made up of two half-adders
answers.b: Full adders can handle double-digit numbers
answers.c: Full adders have a carry input capability
answers.d: Half adders can handle only single-digit numbers

questions.question: Which of the following is correct for full adders?

answers.a: Full adders have the capability of directly adding decimal numbers
answers.b: Full adders are used to make half adders
answers.c: Full adders are limited to two inputs since there are only two binary digits
answers.d: In a parallel full adder, the first stage may be a half adder

answers.a: If all the input are same then a carry is generated
answers.b: If all of the output are independent of the inputs
answers.c: If all of the input are dependent on the output
answers.d: If all of the output are dependent on the input

answers.a: The carry output of the lower order stage is connected to the carry input of the next higher order stage
answers.b: The carry input of the lower order stage is connected to the carry output of the next higher order stage
answers.c: The carry output of the higher order stage is connected to the carry input of the next lower order stage
answers.d: The carry input of the higher order stage is connected to the carry output of the lower order stage
